text:
This enhancement bug allows for patches to the installation instructions to be
submitted to Bugzilla.
creator: hubertus@groepper.com

text:
Created attachment 13782
Patch to allow for more structured installation documentation

This a small restructuring of the installation instructions found at
http://lenya.apache.org/installation/source_version.html. It allows for
different ways of installation/deployment of lenya and removes duplicate
entries like building cocoon. There is a comment in the first paragraph (Intro)
for the recently decided addition of a note on how to build a webapp for remote
deployement. The instruction itself is not there, sorry.
creator: hubertus@groepper.com
